name: PositionableDropdown
description: Positions the dropdown panel for dropdown-like elements (strand-dropdown, strand-autocomplete, strand-pulldown-button)

attributes.name: overflow
attributes.description: The behavior of the dropdown panel when the width of its content exceeds the width of the element. If set to `hidden`, the dropdown panel will truncate its content. If set to `visible`, the dropdown panel will expand to the width of its content.

attributes.name: overflowWidth
attributes.description: The maximum width of the dropdown panel, after which it will truncate its content. If overflowWidth is set, the element will ignore its overflow property.
